title: All-Star Lineup of Cigarlebrities!
itunes:title: All-Star Lineup of Cigarlebrities!
description: This week on The Cigar Authority Dave Garofalo, Mr Jonathan and Chuck Morrison are joined by Maurice Antonius Koks from INTERCIGAR s.a.; Kurt Van Keppel, owner and inventor of the Xikar cutter and the HC Cigar; and the "Blogfather" himself, Jerry Cruz from Stogie Review. It's an all-star lineup of Cigarlebrities right here on The Cigar Authority!
